hibernate-mapping.sql-query: UPDATE EO_ORDER EOOR SET EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_CODE=:eoorStatusCode,EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_NAME=:eoorStatusName,EOOR.MODIFY_TIME = sysdate, EOOR.EOOR_STATUS_REMARK=:eoorStatusRemark, EOOR.eoor_pending_reason =:eoorPendingReason, EOOR.EOOR_OFFSET_REASON = :eoorOffsetReason, EOOR.EOOR_SUBSTR2 =:eoorSubstr2, EOOR.EOOR_SUBSTR7 =:eoorSubstr7 WHERE EOOR.EOOR_ORDER_NO IN(:eoorOrderNos)
